import React , {useState}from 'react' import RestaurantFinder from '../apis/RestaurantFinder'; const AddRestaurant = () => { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [location, setLocation] = useState("") const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState("Price Range"); const handleSubmit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); RestaurantFinder.post('/restaurant', ) .then( (response)) } return (
setName(e.target.value)} type='text' className='form-control' placeholder='name'/>
setLocation(e.target.value)} type='text' className='form-control' placeholder='location'/>
) } export default AddRestaurant
